Summary: Pink Chevron trailed by two smaller white lights
divs: Sighting DetailsI and two friends sat in the backyard and watched a hazy pinkish (lights?) chevron-shaped craft move at medium speed across the sky from northwest to southeast. It was trailed by two small white pinpoints that looked like stars but were moving at the same speed and direction as the first craft. They appeared to be higher up than the chevron shape. The event lasted about thirty seconds.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around July 18th 2009
